Html: I am not a systems admin, but I have dabbled in creating some extensible monitoring apps before and I just wanted to tell you that this project looks awesome - really well laid out and serving a definite need. Great job.

Firstly a big thank you for taking time out to leave your comment - much appreciated and it's great to get feedback.

Secondly if there is any assistance you need with Wolfpack then drop me a line and I'd be very happy to help get it up and running for you - the docs are good but don't really do it justice (something to work on I guess!)....and if you have a specific monitoring requirement or need a tweak to Wolfpack then do let me know, I'm always after more ideas for plugins etc and the best suggestions come from real world users like yourself.

Thanks,

James
